nodes.text: Long Claw was a jurgoran residing on Belsavis during the Cold War. He was killed around 3641 BBY.

Long Claw appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Belsavis. He is not directly involved in any quests, however he can be killed by characters of both factions or loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
